com.redhat.rhn.domain.server

Class Device

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.domain.BaseDomainHelper
      • com.redhat.rhn.domain.server.Device

  • public class Device
extends BaseDomainHelper
    Device represents a hardware device on a server.
